O visual de Dead By Daylight é bom, mas não surpreende. Ao menos ele está um pouco melhor que o gráfico de Friday The 13th, que é realmente fraco. Os cenários são pouco inspirados em termos de design, mas os personagens e o assassino estão bem animados e representados.

LOVE this game! I never imagined I could love being scared so much just from watching it. So far, the best game I have bought as far as me having the most fun. I can be with my friends OR play it publicly and get random players to be with. If you can handle watching it in action for a good amount of time, I highly recommend buying it to feel the intensity yourself.

I used to love this game very much 2 years ago when i first purchased it. Unfortunately as time has gone on this game has got even worse..... every game is basically killers who camp, tunnel or farm. The developers do F*** all about it and it is taking even longer to get into a game, then when you do finally get one, the game is so predictable it actually becomes boring to play and i end up leaving. There is no penalty or punishment for killers who camp, tunnel or farm. 2 years ago I would say i genuinely cared for this game and looked forward to updates but now if this game was taken off this earth i couldn't give a flying F***. Also sort out the hit-boxes, people do have not have 6ft reach on them, the Huntress could throw a hatchet at a wall and it would still hit a survivor. If you are looking at buying this game i probably wouldn't right now and would wait probably 5 years when the developers actually sort it out.

Игра короче нормальная сойдет со скидончиком купить. НО вдруг если вы вней завязнете  вам прийдется раскошелиться на ДЛС. Потом после 300 часов игры к вам прийдет одно ужасное разочарование, вы поймете что выжившие сильнее маньяка. Вы выучить такие слова как ГЕНРАШ, ТОКСИК, ФАНАРИК  и пара других матюков из русского языка. Но  если кроме самой      игры у вас найдется парочка друзей. То игра для вас откроется с совершенно новой стороны. Хотите нагибайте, хотите токсичте. Люди имеющие дискорд это легальные читерасты... PS(для нюрсы все выше сказанное не относится она порвет вашу жопу будь вы с дискордом или без.)

Já tem uns 8 meses que eu não jogo o Dead By Daylight, o último capítulo que comprei foi o Sillent Hill que eu creio ser o melhor lançado até o instante. Desde minha ultima jogada, foram lançados mais 3 assassinos (incluindo o recém lançado Trickstar). Ao que parece a Behavior está perdendo a criatividade, eu nem preciso voltar ao jogo para ver como os 3 últimos assassinos são ridículos, talvez o menos pior destes seja o do capítulo Descend Beyond, este está relacionado as pústulas da entidade.
Eu estou convicto que logo chegará um ponto o jogo estacionará, sem novos assassinos e sobreviventes, obrigando a Behavior a faturar apenas nas skins especiais ou até novos cenários. Até mesmo as perks dos 3 novos assassinos e sobreviventes não diferem tanto das já existentes, apenas variando em algum ponto ao compara-las. 

Resumindo: O último capítulo deste jogo que de fato compensou a criatividade da equipe de desenvolvimento desta empresa foi Sillent Hill. Os 3 seguintes não passaram de um mero capricho em inserir algo no jogo que pudesse ser vendido. Se Capcom não cobrar valores exorbitantes de leasing, até seria uma boa ideia lançar um capítulo Resident Evil, onde o cenário pode ser no casarão da RPD, com o Nemesis de assassino e Jill Valentine como sobrevivente, só este presumido capítulo renderia 3x mais que os assassinos lançados posterior ao Sillent Hill.

我今天刚下游戏打开玩，玩了几把，评价下感受：
我玩人类时：屠夫控场堪比电竞；
我玩屠夫时：人类蛇皮堪比电竞。
所以强烈推荐大家购买，真滴很有趣的游戏，对萌新十分友好，
以至于有几次我实在不认路，队友还跑光了，屠夫竟然亲自把我送到了出口。

Çok eğlenceli bir oyun. Arada sıkıldığımda girip zaman geçiririm diye indirimdeyken alayım demiştim ama çıkamıyorum oyundan, bağımlılık yaptı. Tek iken katil, arkadaşlarlayken kurban oynamak aşırı zevkli oluyor.

Edit: Bu oyuna başladığım günün ben...

I am very emotionally invested in this game. It's been 800 hours wasted of my life. I have not seen my family, friends, or civilization in general since the dawn of this simulation. My love for tunneling, face-camping and NOED grows while my sense of reality dims. I got every characters in this game. Life has no purpose. I have no purpose. Until this life comes out, I shall halt my existence till my sanity returns.

I do not know who I am anymore. So I leave you with this warning. If you play, you may not live to see another day. So, tea-bag while you still can. There is still hope left for humanity. 10/10

Many regards,

 \( °□°)/

ta gra jest pojebana, zero jakiegokolwiek pieprzonego balansu, grając survem killer cie zobaczy - od razu wiesz ze jesteś w dupie, bo zabójca napierdala szybciej niż światło, no przynajmniej szybciej niż twoja postać. Dobra, złapał cie, niesie jak kurna wór ziemniaków na ramieniu, próbujesz mu się wyrwać. Napierdalasz w klawiature żeby zapełnić pasek szamotania jak najszybciej, chuj z wypadającymi klawiszami. Masz pełny pasek, ale nie, nie spindalasz mu, bo on jednak powiesił cie na haku o pół milisekundy szybciej. 

naprawde polecam gierke, jest świetna :)

edit: otóż, po zmianie maina z surva na killera i pograniu trochę dłużej, stwierdzam, że brak jakiegokolwiek pieprzonego balansu w tej grze działa na korzyść surva :)
tak serio, to rzeczywiście z moich obserwacji wynika, ze killerzy maja nie tyle gorzej, co moze ciężej - wydaje mi się, że dużo więcej jest spoconych, klikających latarką survów niż kampiących czy tunelujących killerów. Aczkolwiek jak trafi się na kulturalnych ludzi w meczu, gra potrafi być naprawdę wciągająca i po prostu przyjemna.

Tak więc jak lubisz od czasu do czasu zasolić krzesło próbując wyruchać toxic survów czy myć się po próbie ucieczki kampiącemu killerowi, a od czasu do czasu miło spędzić czas, to naprawdę polecam ;)

edit 2: mmr jest zesrane

pretty fun game

ok let's start the Review: 
Killer is very stressful, when you encounter high ranked survivors the game becomes just a constant chase and almost nobody hides from you because they know they have power over you in certain scenarios. If they are really coordinated then your killer choice will narrow just to improve your chances of beating them.

As Survivor you depend on your teammates to not save you when the killer is baiting and instead do gens or to save you when the killer is distracted. Gens are important, some survivors get so caught up in the chase that no generators get done. If no generators get done, the killer will only get more powerful as the game goes on because of the limited pallets around the map, these are obstacles that can be used ONCE.



The game of DbD is a game of cat and mouse where the killer's most difficult part of killing survivors isnt usually with finding them but actually catching them and survivors needing to learn the killers weaknesses.

With killers and survivors your success will come from how well they coordinate together, which can be aggravating from both sides.



That being said I cant stop playing it, I love the game for all the same reasons I hate it and it is more balanced now than it has ever been. You will get dominated for the first 20 or so hours playing the game, accept it. Watch some streams on twitch for mains of both sides and you should get a pretty good idea, its basically virtual tag.

getting some good perks will definitely help, I highly recommend trying nurse at least once. While she is difficult to use because of her fatigue mechanics, she is the best killer when mastered objectively.

The game is full of salt, please ignore after game chat for a while, Don't listen to the community whine and complain about things, almost everyone feels entitled somewhere in this game.
